required_outline.I. Executive Summary: One- to three-page description of the business model
required_outline.II. Business History, Background and Obj: Description of the company, objectives, company successes and challenges, and requirements to franchise
required_outline.III. Business Environment: Description of how environmental factors may affect the business
required_outline.IV. Products and/or Services: List of and descriptions of the products and/or services offered
required_outline.V. Present Market: Description of the present market, growth potential and pricing policy
required_outline.VI. Competition: List of the company's primary competitors in the market and identification of their strengths and weaknesses
required_outline.VII. Marketing Plan: Description of existing and future marketing techniques and strategies
required_outline.VIII. Management and Organization: Description of the management team, management team development plan, succession plan, and the need for additional personnel
required_outline.IX. Business Resources: Major operating equipment, major suppliers, payment terms, outside resources, quality control procedures, availability of skilled labor, training needs, number of full-time and part-time employees, and organizational chart
required_outline.X. Financial Plan and Data: Sales and profit trends, strategy and timing for obtaining capital, two-year projected operating statement, one-year projected cash flow statement
required_outline.XI. Conclusion: Specific request for financing, summary of key points supporting the financial request
